00030 CHPBackgroundZone::CHPBackgroundZone(float x, float y, float bg, float smooth)
00031 {
00032         centerX = x;
00033         centerY = y;
00034         background = bg;
00035         smoothFactor = smooth;
00036 }

00040 void CHPBackgroundZone::Clear()

00045         smoothFactor = 0.0;

00048 CHPBackgroundZone CHPBackgroundZone::operator=(CHPBackgroundZone zn)
00049         {

00051                 centerY = zn.GetCenterY(); 
00052                 background = zn.GetBackground();
00053                 smoothFactor = zn.GetSmoothFactor();
00054                 return *this; 
00055         }
